text: Konstantinos Banousis (; born 23 January 1988) is a Greek footballer who plays as a midfielder for P.S. «I Sparti».Οι τιμωρημένοι στη 18η αγωνιστική της Β’ Εθνικής, aigioallsports.gr, 2019 ==Career== He began his career from the youth team of AEL, and in 2009 he was given on loan to Haidari and in the next season to Pyrsos Grevena. He has also played for Eordaikos 2007, and for Oikonomos Tsaritsani, (teams of lower National Categories), until 6 August 2012, when he made the major step to Greek Super League signing for OFI. He competed with the Cretan club for almost 2,5 years. After the dissolution of the team due to major financial problems, he freed himself from his professional contract and on 20 January 2015 he signed with AEL. ==References== ==External links== * * Onsports Profile * myplayer * aelole goal Vs Platanias (Video) Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Greek footballers Category:Greek expatriate footballers Category:AE Larissa FC players Category:Chaidari F.C. players Category:Pyrsos Grevena F.C. players Category:Eordaikos 2007 F.C. players Category:OFI Crete F.C. players Category:Sparta F.C. players Category:Ermis Aradippou FC players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Football League (Greece) players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Greek expatriate sportspeople in Cyprus Category:Expatriate footballers in Cyprus Category:Association football midfielders
title: Konstantinos Banousis
